requirements.title: Service Invitation Handling
requirements.description: Ability to receive and track client invitations for cementing services.

requirements.title: Proposal & Bidding
requirements.description: System to prepare, submit, and manage service proposals and bids.

requirements.title: Bid Result Processing
requirements.description: Mechanism to record and act on client bidding decisions.

requirements.title: Service Request Management
requirements.description: Workflow to initiate and track cementing service requests post-bid.

requirements.title: Service Execution
requirements.description: Tools and processes for planning, mobilizing, and performing cementing services at well sites.

requirements.title: Reporting & Invoicing
requirements.description: Automated generation and delivery of service reports and invoices to clients.

requirements.title: Payment Tracking
requirements.description: Monitor client payments and outstanding invoices.

requirements.title: Post Job Analysis
requirements.description: Framework for post-job review, feedback collection, and continuous improvement.

notes: Process is highly client-driven, with clear handoffs between client and Sanjel at each stage.
Internal coordination is critical during service execution and post-job analysis.
Timely reporting and invoicing are essential for cash flow and client satisfaction.
